attributes.action: Have a public enquiry to examine the integrity of Leave the EU campaign claims.
attributes.additional_details: The £350 million funding pledge for NHS for example, it never had support by politicians representing the Leave campaign. They campaigned supporting a pledge that they had no commitment to implement, this was misleading for the UK electorate. They also made misleading information and pledges on a number of other key issues, please investigate the conduct and legitimatcy of the Leave campaign's leaders throughout the campaign and immeditely afterwards.
attributes.background: Some major claims and pledges from the Leave campaign during the 2016 EU referendum campaign have proven to be unrealistic and were unachievable from the outset. Top Leave politicians allowed their campaign to mislead the UK electorate with claims that they did not support and were not achievable.
